article_metadata.author: Schuyler Moore

og.description: The term “crowdfunding” is being bantered around as the latest savior of those seeking independent film financing (referred to as film companies in this article).  There are several different types of crowdfunding, and it is helpful to be clear on which type is being discussed, so here is a course [...]
